field.name: show_buttons_icons
field.label: Login and Logout Buttons
field.description: Select how to display the login and logout buttons.

field.name: https_post
field.label: Encrypt Login Form
field.description: Submit encrypted login data (requires SSL). Do not enable this option if Joomla is not accessible using the https:// protocol prefix.

field.name: cb_plugins
field.label: CB Plugins integration
field.description: Choose if you want to use CB events for CB plugins integration. Plugins must be installed and configured in CB plugins management. Warning: this loads CB plugins on each page where this module is displayed, consuming memory and processing power.

field.name: pretext
field.label: Login Pre-text
field.description: Input substitution supported html to display at the top of the login form.

field.name: posttext
field.label: Login Post-text
field.description: Input substitution supported html to display at the bottom of the login form.

field.name: login
field.label: Login Redirection URL
field.description: What page will the login redirect to after login. If let blank will reload current page

field.name: name_label
field.label: Username Input Label
field.description: Select how to display the label for the username input.

field.name: name_length
field.label: Username Input Length
field.description: Input the length in characters to display the username input as.

field.name: pass_label
field.label: Password Input Label
field.description: Select how to display the label for the password input.

field.name: pass_length
field.label: Password Input Length
field.description: Input the length in characters to display the password input as.

field.name: key_label
field.label: Secret Key Label
field.description: Select how to display the label for the secret key input. Note this is only available if two step authentication is enabled.

field.name: key_length
field.label: Secret Key Length
field.description: Input the length in characters to display the secret key input as. Note this is only available if two step authentication is enabled.

field.name: remember_enabled
field.label: Remember Me Checkbox
field.description: Select how to display the remember me checkbox.

field.name: show_lostpass
field.label: Forgot Login Link
field.description: Show or hide the forgot login link.

field.name: show_newaccount
field.label: Register Login Link
field.description: Show or hide the register link. This does not disable registration, but simply controls the display of the registration link on this module.

field.name: login_message
field.label: Login Message
field.description: Show or hide a message indicating login success.

field.name: logoutpretext
field.label: Logout Pre-text
field.description: Input substitution supported html to display at the top of the logout form.

field.name: logoutposttext
field.label: Logout Post-text
field.description: Input substitution supported html to display at the bottom of the logout form.

field.name: logout
field.label: Logout Redirection URL
field.description: What page will the logout redirect to after logout. With a double-cross (#) it will reload current page. If let blank or set to index.php, it will go to home-page, avoiding unauthorized access messages.

field.name: greeting
field.label: Show Greeting
field.description: Show or hide greeting.

field.name: show_avatar
field.label: Show Avatar
field.description: Show or hide users avatar.

field.name: text_show_profile
field.label: Profile Link Text
field.description: A text or HTML to display in a link to user's profile which displays in login module when user is logged in. WARNING: you always need to create a public menu item to CB Profile (see README file). HINT: you can use language definition. Leave empty to not display. It will follow icons settings for register/login reminder.

field.name: icon_show_profile
field.label: Profile Link Icon
field.description: Show or hide profile view link icon.

field.name: text_edit_profile
field.label: Profile Edit Link Text
field.description: A text or HTML to display in a link to user's edit profile screen which displays in login module when user is logged in. WARNING: you always need to create a public menu item to CB Profile (see README file). HINT: you can use language definition. Leave empty to not display. It will follow icons settings for register/login reminder.

field.name: icon_edit_profile
field.label: Profile Edit Link Icon
field.description: Show or hide profile edit link icon.

field.name: show_pms
field.label: Private Message Notifications
field.description: Choose if you want to display count of unread PMS messages. PMS integration must be activated in CB configuration.

field.name: show_pms_icon
field.label: Private Message Icon
field.description: Show or hide private message notifications icon.

field.name: show_connection_notifications
field.label: Connection Request Notifications
field.description: Choose if you want to display Connections notifications for pending approvals etc. Connections must be activated in CB configuration.

field.name: show_connection_notifications_icon
field.label: Connection Request Icon
field.description: Show or hide connection request notifications icon.

field.name: logout_message
field.label: Logout Message
field.description: Show or hide a message indicating logout success.

field.name: style_username_cssclass
field.label: Username Input CSS Class
field.description: Optionally replace the username input css class.

field.name: style_password_cssclass
field.label: Password Input CSS Class
field.description: Optionally replace the password input css class.

field.name: style_secretkey_cssclass
field.label: Secret Key Input CSS Class
field.description: Optionally replace the secret key input css class.

field.name: style_login_cssclass
field.label: Login Button CSS Class
field.description: Optionally replace the login button css class.

field.name: style_logout_cssclass
field.label: Logout Button CSS Class
field.description: Optionally replace the logout button css class.

field.name: style_forgotlogin_cssclass
field.label: Forgot Login Link CSS Class
field.description: Optionally replace the forgot login link css class.

field.name: style_register_cssclass
field.label: Register Link CSS Class
field.description: Optionally replace the register link css class.

field.name: style_profile_cssclass
field.label: Profile Link CSS Class
field.description: Optionally replace the profile link css class.

field.name: style_profileedit_cssclass
field.label: Profile Edit Link CSS Class
field.description: Optionally replace the profile edit link css class.

field.name: style_connrequests_cssclass
field.label: Connection Requests Link CSS Class
field.description: Optionally replace the connection requests link css class.

field.name: style_privatemsgs_cssclass
field.label: Private Messages Link CSS Class
field.description: Optionally replace the private messages link css class.
